medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and vomiting for past week, with epigastric abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Nausea for one week, vomiting for the past 3 days. Developed epigastric pain radiating bilaterally in a band-like form, not radiating to the back. Symptoms include loose stools concurrent with vomiting, unable to tolerate oral intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, Anxiety disorder, Seizure disorder, Hypothyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of hepatobiliary disease.
medical_history.social_history: Drinks alcohol a few times per week, last drink 3 days ago, no recent heavy alcohol use.
